newsitem.title: USA: Anicom gets new $50-mln credit facility.
newsitem.headline: Anicom gets new $50-mln credit facility.

text.p: Anicom Inc said it reached an agreement in principle with a syndicate of lenders for a new $50-million unsecured revolving credit facility.

The syndicate includes Harris Trust and Savings Bank, a unit of Bank of Montreal, LaSalle National Bank, a unit of ABN AMRO Holding NV, and First National Bank of Chicago, a unit of First Chicago NBD Corp.

"This credit facility will replace the company's existing $10-million revolving credit agreement with Harris Trust and Savings Bank. The company intends to use this facility for acquisition opportunities and general corporate purposes," said the distributor of multimedia technology products.
